articles.description:
RTâ€‚Nilesh ğŸª
We launched @orbwagmi at N&W S1, and so many crazy things happened afterward. We(a team of three) ended up doing it full-time, and thousands of users use the app every day. 
This is a perfect place where you can make your product go 0 to 1 in just 6 weeks.
1-day left to apply.
Farza ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ ğŸ‡µğŸ‡°:â€‚We're running Nights & Weekends S2.
It's a 6-week sprint where you'll join 500 other builders and: pick an idea, build it out, ship it, and get real users.
At the end, we invite everyone out IRL to SF to build at @fdotinc for 3-days
1-day left, apply:
â€‚https://buildspace.so/nights-weekends
